Graph visualization¶

real_q_voter.visualization.plot_degree_distribution(g: networkx.classes.graph.Graph, bins=50, filename=None)¶

Plot degree distribution of given g graph.

Parameters

  • g – nx.Graph

  • bins – number of bins for histogram

  • filename – Name of the output figure

real_q_voter.visualization.plot_network(g: networkx.classes.graph.Graph, filename=None, **parameters)¶

Plot g network

Parameters

  • g – nx.Graph

  • filename – Name of the output figure
